revision.text:
[[File:KeyItems11.png|Currently available Key Items|right|400px]] '''Key Items''' are special items obtained by player as they progress through the game. ==Usage== Key Items are active automatically upon acquisition. To see acquired Key Items go to Start Menu > Items > Key Items. ==List of Items== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Image ! Name ! How to obtain ! Effect |- | [[File:Teachy_Tv.png|24px]] | [[Teachy TV]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | N/A |- | [[File:Coin_Case.png|24px]] | [[Coin Case]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | Allows the collection of [[Poké Dollar|Poké Dollars]] |- | [[File:Pokeball_Bag.png|24px]] | [[Pokéball Bag]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | Allows the collection of [[Pokéballs]] |- | [[File:Town_Map.png|24px]] | [[Town Map]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 1 | Unlocks Town Map panel |- | [[File:Dungeon_Ticket.png|24px]] | [[Dungeon Ticket]] | Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] for 100 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} | Allows entry to [[Dungeons|dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{dungeontokens}} |- | [[File:Super_Rod.png|24px]] | [[Super Rod]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 12 | Allows water Pokémon to be encountered and caught in the wild |- | [[File:Holo_Caster.png|24px]] | [[Holo Caster]] | Catch 110 different Pokémon or more. | Allows users to see and track [[Achievements]] |- | [[File:Mystery_Egg_Item.png|24px]] | [[Mystery Egg Key Item|Mystery Egg]] | Get 10 defeats on [[Kanto]] Route 5. | Opens [[Pokemon Day Care|Pokémon Day Care]] |- | [[File:Safari_Ticket.png|24px]] | [[Safari Ticket]] | Clear the [[Gyms#Kanto|Fuchsia Gym]] in [[Kanto]] | Allows entry to the [[Kanto]] [[Safari Zone]] |- | [[File:Wailmer_pail.png|24px]] | [[Wailmer Pail]] | Unlock [[Kanto]] Route 14 | Allows entry to the [[Farm]] |- | [[File:Explorer_Kit.png|24px]] | [[Explorer Kit]] | Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cinnabar Island]] for 5000 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} | Allows entry to the [[Underground]] |- | [[File:Event_Calendar.png|24px]] | [[Event Calendar]] | Currently unobtainable | N/A |- | [[File:Gem_Case.png|24px]] | [[Gem Case]] | Clear the Viridian Gym in [[Kanto]] | Allows the collection of [[Gems]] and the purchase of Gem upgrades |- | [[File:DNA_Splicers.png|24px]] | [[DNA Splicers]] | Clear the [[Giant Chasm]] Dungeon in [[Unova]] | Allows the player to get the DNA [[Evolution Items]] |- | [[File:Pokérus Virus.png|24px]] | [[Pokérus Virus]] | Clear the [[Distortion World]] dungeon in [[Sinnoh]] | Gives the Player [[Pokérus]] and EVs |- | [[File:Reins of Unity.png|24px]] | [[Reins of Unity]] | Progress through "The Crown of Galar" [[Questlines|Questline]] | Allows the player to get the Mane Hair [[Evolution Items]] |} {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
